title: Motown, slowtown: Luxury car sales slow in line with broader slowdown in Indian auto market
description: Carmakers attributed the sluggish performance to a broader slowdown in the Indian car market, besides intense heat waves this summer, and an extended general election. Some experts also cited a shift in spending by the wealthy to experiences such as bespoke holiday itineraries.
